qas.question: What is the name of the amphitheater located inside the Botanical Gardens?

context: One of the more prominent landmarks downtown is the Crystal Bridge at the Myriad Botanical Gardens, a large downtown urban park. Designed by <a0_0>I. M. Pei<a0_0/>, the Crystal Bridge is a tropical conservatory in the area. The park has an amphitheater, known as the <a1_0>Water Stage<a1_0/>. In 2007, following a renovation of the stage, Oklahoma Shakespeare in the Park relocated to the Myriad Gardens. The Myriad Gardens will undergo a massive renovation in conjunction with the recently built Devon Tower directly north of it.
